remarks: Sums of independent vectors must have equal coefficients.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lvecindp2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lvecindp2.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lvecindp2.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lvecindp2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lvecindp2.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lvecindp2.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lvecindp2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lvecindp2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lvecindp2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lvecindp2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lvecindp2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
lvecindp2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. K ) $.
lvecindp2.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. K ) $.
lvecindp2.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. K ) $.
lvecindp2.q $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lvecindp2.e $e |- ( ph -> ( ( A .x. X ) .+ ( B .x. Y ) ) = ( ( C .x. X ) .+ ( D .x. Y ) ) ) $.
lvecindp2 $p |- ( ph -> ( A = C /\ B = D ) ) $.
